unityfx.name: UnityFX
unityfx.description: Shared pattern library for SPFx solutions (installers, data access, dashboards, UI shell, and components).

patterns.name: UnityFX Principles
patterns.description: High-level principles and philosophy that guide all UnityFX patterns and implementations.

patterns.name: Feature Module Pattern
patterns.description: Guidance for structuring UnityFX solutions into feature modules with clear boundaries and responsibilities.

patterns.name: Installer Pattern (Core)
patterns.description: Defines the overall UnityFX installer model: spec, validation, creation/fixup, and admin UX.

patterns.name: Installer – Basic List Provisioning
patterns.description: Concrete installer sub-pattern for provisioning SharePoint lists, fields, and views in an idempotent, configuration-driven way.
outputs: Provisioned SharePoint lists ready for use by UnityFX components

patterns.name: Services Logging Config Pattern
patterns.description: Pattern for configuring logging for services and data access within UnityFX-based solutions.

patterns.name: Data Access Pattern
patterns.description: Core data access guidance for UnityFX, including how services interact with repositories and external APIs.

patterns.name: Data Service – PnPjs List Repository
patterns.description: Encapsulates a SharePoint list in a typed repository built on PnPjs, providing a clean API for UI components.
outputs: Typed repository interface for list operations

patterns.name: Fullscreen Layout Pattern
patterns.description: Detailed fullscreen layout pattern for complex UnityFX apps, including shell behavior and advanced layout rules.

patterns.name: UI – Fullscreen Shell (Lite)
patterns.description: Lightweight fullscreen shell pattern with toolbar, fullscreen toggle, and optional side panel, focused on reduced flicker and fast startup.

patterns.name: Fluent UI Pattern
patterns.description: Guidance for using Fluent UI within UnityFX solutions, including component usage and theming expectations.

patterns.name: Pill Status Cards Pattern
patterns.description: Pattern for pill-style status cards used across UnityFX dashboards and UIs.

patterns.name: Dashboard – Card Grid + Filters
patterns.description: Standard dashboard layout with filters and a responsive card grid.

patterns.name: Form – Modal Item Editor
patterns.description: Modal-based create/edit form pattern for items in a dashboard.

patterns.name: Experimental Patterns
patterns.description: Grab-bag of experimental or in-progress UnityFX patterns.

metadata.notes: UnityFX v0.1 manifest. Folder structure and pattern list are expected to grow over time.
